conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric-style 3D cutaway that maintains almost perfect geometric alignment with the source plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent thickness, heights are uniform, and the viewing angle is ideal for architectural visualization.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate room configuration and wall positioning. Even minor niches and partition walls are captured correctly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is very high fidelity compared to the 2D plan, including rug placements and kitchen cabinetry.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and material application; minor score reduction for small text fragments on the floor surface.

detected_errors.description: Faint text remnants/labels visible on the floor of some rooms.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the complex layout and furniture arrangement of the original 2D floor plan with high precision.
